fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night. If their role is shit they should stop doing, stop them from doing that shit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability is mandatory.
- Roleblock immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Stop 2 people from doing shit, or stop doing this shit (you stop doing this shit if you fail to use your ability and then never use it again due to death, game end, etc.)
